titlestmt.titleproper: East India Company of North America records 1799
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

did.unittitle: East India Company of North America records

scopecontent.p: Articles of Association of the East India Company of North America, Philadelphia, established as a company trading to "certain countries and islands situated beyond the Cape of Good Hope" in 1799; receipts for shares purchased; articles of dissolution, 1800; and a brief financial account. "Articles of Association. . ." printed by John Ward Fenno, Philadelphia, 1799.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.

acqinfo.p: Provenance: Gift of Robert B. Davidson
